title: Darius gets rewarded for successful ult. Can Garen also get rewarded for successful ult?
body:
**when i say "rewarded", i mean being able to make meaningful contributions to teamfights, not just the kill gold.**

When Darius pulls off a successful ultimate, he is rewarded with ~~more slaughtering~~ even more damage, which makes him threatening in teamfights.
When Garen pulls off a successful ultimate, he is rewarded with nothing but the kill gold and a visual effect that has no real effect on the rest of the teamfight.

I think the problem with Garen's ult can also be a good spot to reinforce his identity as the magic-hating Might of Demacia, and also as an opposing force against Hand of Noxus; currently Darius brings **_offensive_** threat against multiple enemies on his ult, so it would be thematically make sense for Garen to bring a **_defensive_** threat via allies. For example, making allies near the ult-executed enemy champion gain magic shield ~~morgana shield without the cc immunity part~~ would actually give him something to contribute in teamfights.

Balance-wise, I think it would also reduce the win rate gap between low and high elo. Because 1vs1 or 2v2 skirmishes have high impact on win/lose in low elo, a change to Garen's ult affecting allies would barely affect his performance in low elo. At same time, a change to Garen's ult affecting allies would affect his performance in high elo significantly due to teamfights being a lot more important in high elo compared to in low elo.

The point is that it takes half a brain and 3/10 fingers to play Garen. There's actual variance in output to Darius's kit, so he gets *better reward for landing what could otherwise miss or be less effective.*

The issue is simple, but Garen players don't like it: Garen needs to be a harder champion. Period. Otherwise, it's tough noodles.

The solution to all our problems appears to be a rework of Garen lol

He really does not need a major rework. At best he needs a tweak to solidify what kind of role riot wants for him. Should he be a tank? Give him crowd control then. Should he be the kind of guy who rushes the enemy back lines? Give him a better initiation then but no crowd control. 

I think either a Rengar-like leap when within range on his Q would be best to solidify his role as the guy who jumps into the thick of it just do damage. 

But if they wanted to give him some level of crowd control without over blowing it I would say some kind of displacement on his ultimate like the other Demacian champions would work really well. Something like "other enemy champions are knocked away from the impact site" and have it only affect a small area around the targeted champion to separate clusters of enemies.

If Garen was going to be a tank, he'd need a ton of damage removed and cc added. If he was gonna be a diver, he'd need a full on dash.

Half-assing changes isn't going to fix Garen. Garen's basically the new "old Poppy". I'm fully prepared to see Garen complained about until a major game play update is announced or people don't care anymore.
